Drop Shiping

The method of order fulfillment where a merchant does not store or ship the product they sell, and the entire product supply chain is managed by the manufacturer, is known as drop-shipping. The merchant forwards the order received from the customer to the manufacturer, who manages the delivery directly from their warehouse to the customer. This is a useful method of order fulfillment; drop-shipping allows retailers to manage multitudes of suppliers and guarantees a standardized customer experience.

Online Sellers

ShipMax ensures that your brand reputation is maintained, as we will only connect you to verified and reliable drop-shipping suppliers. Managing delivery to your customers via these suppliers is our responsibility, so we will act as the intermediary between you and the drop-ship supplier.

Our drop-shipping solution allows brands to ship their products directly to customers with customized packaging, while also being assured of retail compliance. The growth of marketplaces with the intent to cater to diversified customer needs without having to maintain and invest in inventory has made drop-shipping a crucial element of retailers’ success strategies.

Brand Owners

ShipMax can manage your drop-shipping program by connecting you to digital marketing specialists and online sellers who can help you distribute your brand through a huge range of channels.

features

Our shipping agent network will help you save on cost

The shipping process has been simplified; our professional staff oversees the order processing and delivery process from start to finish, which ensures excellent national and international services for all our clients. Our professional employees provide exceptional, high-end logistics services for e-commerce operations, to deliver reliable services for your e-commerce business.

Discounted shipping and consolidation services

In addition to fulfillment services, ShipMax also provides storage and fulfillment facilities across the globe to ensure product safety and rapid delivery services. With our dedicated storage facilities, our clients can greatly increase their product reach in the international market. Our clients can market and sell their product in the United States with the help of our logistics platform, which can make their product an international brand overnight. Our services are ideally suited for B2B or B2C business, as they are customer-oriented and dedicated to services where we can help.

Top-notch software as a service platform

ShipMax employs cloud-based logistics software with a user-friendly interface that allows you to monitor your inventory anywhere and anytime. This cutting-edge software allows clients to connect and get information regarding their product from our shipping agents anywhere in the U.S. All of our services are accessible online through this software platform. We have data centers across the globe that provide free services for our clients to help them with their particular needs. Our service platform provides easy access through pre-built connectors and is supported by professionals who are ready to handle every diverse development need our valued clients may have.

Scale your e-commerce along with your business

Our platform can support businesses from their startup phase and development to become mature businesses and medium-sized enterprises and organizations. We typically help small- and medium-sized organizations and enterprises on our platform but also cater to the needs of individual sellers on Amazon and eBay. Our e-commerce platform is fully compatible with major online retail platforms and provides complete retail compliance and vendor management. Our platform offers business channels for both B2C and B2B outlets, and we ensure that our clients’ online business grows in addition to any physical outlets they may have.

Other Benefits of
Drop Shipping:

  • Control and track your supply chain. To improve your customers' shopping experience, it is best to maintain open and direct communication with your supplier.
  • Increase your product offerings. Be receptive to customer needs and be quick to cater to them through your product line.
  • Test new products. Do pilot runs of new products to gauge customer interest before making large investments in them.
  • Introduce categories in bulk. By bulk uploading information and content to spreadsheets, you can beat the competition by releasing new products quickly.
  • Instantaneous transfer of products among vendors. Through Fulfillment Relay, you can sell products from a variety of vendors to your customers.
  • Add more vendors. Develop an online portal to automate onboarding and sharing of your KPIs among your suppliers.
  • Track Supplier Performance. Monitor your suppliers' order accuracy, speed of delivery, and compliance with standards.

Maximize Cash Flow & Reduce Expenses

Minimize the expenses being incurred on inventory management; instead, invest in initiatives that actually grow your business!

An effective drop shipping solution can help eliminate your woes and increase your business reputation by complying with local branding standards, adhering to retail partner guidelines and SLAs, and accessing a global shipping agent network—allowing you to ship thousands of orders in a day.

The key to an effective drop-shipping solution is speed, confidentiality, and consistency.
